Advisor profile

Advisor profile

Display an individual's profile on the page.

On this page
  • Visual design
  • Guidelines for use
  • Layouts
  • Examples and assets

Visual design

Design view:

Mobile design

Desktop designs can be viewed on screens wider than 650px.

CSS styles

Desktop

Advisor name
h4 {
    color: #333333;
    font-family: OpenSans-Semibold;
    font-size: 24px;
    line-height: 38px;
}
Advisor details
p.detail-type {
    color: #333333;
    font-family: OpenSans-Semibold;
    font-size: 16px;
    line-height: 28px;
}
p.detail-information {
    color: #333333;
    font-family: OpenSans;
    font-size: 16px;
    line-height: 28px;
}
Paragraph
p {
    color: #333333;
    font-family: OpenSans;
    font-size: 16px;
    line-height: 32px;
}
Container
.container {
    background-color: #EBEBEB;
    border-top: 4px solid #D8D8D8;
    padding: 32px;
}

Mobile

Advisor name
h4 {
    font-size: 18px;
    line-height: 28px;
}
Advisor details
p.detail-type {
    font-size: 16px;
    line-height: 24px;
}

    font-size: 16px;
    line-height: 24px;
}
Container
.container {
    padding: 24px 16px;
}

Guidelines for use

Purpose:

Used to display advisor details in a pre-defined layout.

When to use this component:

  • On pages that require a list of advisor profiles, that include their contact details and a photo.

Layouts

Page layouts

Advisor profiles are used in two-third width pages.

Component layout options

Full width layout

Desktop, Tablet & Mobile: One component in a row.

Examples and assets

View the advisor profile design and assets in Adobe XD.
